abstract: Neuroscience is getting better at predicting our choices, but there are some things that observation can't tell us.
snippet: Neuroscience is getting better at predicting our choices, but there are some things that observation can't tell us.
lead_paragraph: The Stone is featuring occasional posts by Gary Gutting, a professor of philosophy at the University of Notre Dame, that apply critical thinking to information and events that have appeared in the news.
